sentences.en: An amateur shouldn't play roulette for high stakes.
sentences.cn: 外行不该下大赌注赌轮盘赌.

sentences.en: Farmer in particular was obsessed with the roulette wheel.
sentences.cn: 法默对轮盘赌的轮盘特别着迷.

sentences.en: He gambled his money on one spin of the wheel , eg at a game of roulette.
sentences.cn: 他把钱压在(轮盘赌等的)一局上.

sentences.en: He was totally cleaned out after a night at the roulette table.
sentences.cn: 在一夜的轮盘赌桌上,他输光了所有的钱.

sentences.en: Horses, cards, roulette - he didn't care what the game was.
sentences.cn: 马, 扑克, 轮盘赌,他才不在乎会发生什么事.

sentences.en: I decided to try my luck at the roulette wheel.
sentences.cn: 我决定在轮盘赌上试试运气.

sentences.en: I think I'll try my luck at roulette.
sentences.cn: 我想玩玩轮盘赌碰碰运气.

sentences.en: I'm going to have a look at the roulette table.
Of course, the roulette wheel won't be as easy to beat as you are.
sentences.cn: 当然, 轮盘赌可不像你那样不堪一击.

sentences.en: On holidays people often go to casinos to play roulette and billiards.
sentences.cn: 节假日人们常去赌场玩轮盘赌和台球戏.

sentences.en: The airline was accused of playing Russian roulette with passenger safety.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司被指责将乘客安全当儿戏。

sentences.en: The entrance to the old Casino with Roulette and Black Jack tables.
sentences.cn: 老赌场的门口,那里是轮盘赌和玩二十一点纸牌的地方.

sentences.en: We played roulette till two o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我们玩了轮盘赌,一直玩到两点钟.

sentences.en: You are playing Russian roulette every time you have unprotected sex.
sentences.cn: 行房时不采取避孕措施是非常危险的。

sentences.en: You write as if you and Soros have been playing roulette.
sentences.cn: 你写得就好像你和索罗斯是在玩儿轮盘赌一样.

trans.tran_en: a game in which a small ball is spun around on a moving wheel, and people try to win money by guessing which hole the ball will fall into
